ygData.subject: Re: Real females on Rallos Zek?
ygData.msgSnippet: I admit, I ve had a great time with Valdaya.  Her description has two words in it:  I bite. hehe She s quite a change in RP for me from my wood elf ranger on
ygData.messageBody:
I admit, I've had a great time with Valdaya. Her description has two words in
it: "I bite." hehe
She's quite a change in RP for me from my wood elf ranger on Povar, and I admit
I enjoy letting my "darker" side out once in a while......=)
Sara, Povar

MJ Solomon wrote:

> From: "MJ Solomon" <mjsol@...>
>
> I'm glad to hear from a real female on Rallos Zek! I'm glad you haven't had
> too many problems. My friend has dabbled with a dark elf necromancer, and
> he says the dark elves are zealous about not pvping their own kind.
> Unfortunately, the Wood elves do not have that sort of pack.
>
> I haven't been annoyed enough to quit yet. But I was wondering. Thanks for
> the information.
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Suzanne Johnson <katannah@...>
> To: EQ_women@onelist.com <EQ_women@onelist.com>
> Date: Monday, June 21, 1999 10:56 AM
> Subject: Re: [EQ_women] Real females on Rallos Zek?
>
> >From: Suzanne Johnson <katannah@...>
> >
> >I play a dark elf female cleric on Rallos Zek, and I haven't actually run
> into
> >those problems there as much as I have on Povar. Maybe it's the whole
> cleric
> >thing, I dunno. On the other hand, I DID meet one of the best roleplayers
> I've
> >ever seen on that server, and after he rescued me from a pretty hairy
> >situation, he gave me patchwork leggings....unsolicited! He had just
> upgraded
> >and appreciated my roleplaying and effusive gratitude and thought I was
> worthy.
> ><shrugs> Nothing like that had ever happened to me on Povar. The PvP
> server
> >wasn't what I expected, I must say, and neither was playing a Dark elf
> >character. It's actually been a good experience!
> >
> >Sara, Povar
> >Valdaya, Rallos Zek
> >
> >MJ Solomon wrote:
> >
> >> From: "MJ Solomon" <mjsol@...>
> >>
> >> My RL friend plays on Rallos Zek. He doesn't SAY he wants me to play
> there,
> >> but he keeps asking about the character I made on that server.
> >>
> >> Anyway Saturday I spent level 2 being chased by a "female" character
> named
> >> Typehere in the newbie area outside Kelethin. It was annoying, though
> >> there's no reason to whine and complain if you are playing on Rallos Zek.
> >> But I just no for certain that Typehere was NOT a real female.
> >>
> >> So I'm asking if there ARE any real females on Rallos Zek. I told my
> friend
> >> no, he said he thought there were.
> >> Anyone here play there? How do you put up with the annoyances? I'm as
> tough
> >> as anyone, but the game is challenging enough as it is, without worrying
> >> about "Typeheres."
> >>
> >> ------------------------------------------------------------------------

> >> http://www.onelist.com
> >> ONElist has 170,000 e-mail communities from which to choose!
> >
> >
> >------------------------------------------------------------------------
> >How many communities do you think join ONElist each week?
> >http://www.onelist.com
> >More than 5,000! Create yours now!
> >
